rationale: The segment describes the number of birds slaughtered, a consequence/metric, not an intensifier/comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Most of those cases involve only tens of thousands of birds, but 1.2 million birds at one Iowa egg farm and another 940,000 chickens at one Minnesota egg farm had to be slaughtered last week after the disease was found.

rationale: The segment uses the high-potency verb 'slaughtered' to describe the impact of the disease.
